heading: HB07996
0: AN ACT PROVIDING HEALTH MAINTENANCE ORGANIZATION (HMO) FOR ALL PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2018-08-08
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07996
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING HEALTH MAINTENANCE ORGANIZATION (HMO) FOR ALL PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS
ABSTRACT : Recognizes the teacher’s role in educating and shaping the youth by compensating them not just with monetary remuneration but also with medical healthcare. Provides therefore a health maintenance organization (HMO) program for all public school teachers in all levels in order to promote and maintain their health.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Del Mar (000 2018-09-05)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2018-08-08
